description: Manage events through a local calendar server and synchronize with iCloud CalDAV. Can be used to create, update, delete, query, and manually trigger synchronization.

apis.create: Create a new calendar event and push it to the configured iCloud calendar.
apis.update: Update an existing event by UID and sync it to the remote.
apis.delete: Remove an event by UID; when options.soft=true, perform a soft delete instead.
apis.read: Retrieve a single event from the local cache by UID.
apis.list: Filter event lists by conditions (calendarName, rangeStart, rangeEnd, includeDeleted).
apis.push: Manually trigger synchronization: defaults to incremental, set options.type='full' for a full sync.
apis.status: Return status information of the local server and synchronization mode.

input.action: One of create, update, delete, read, list, push, status.
input.payload: Required when action=create or update; must include event fields such as calendarName, summary, startISO, endISO.
input.uid: Required when action=update, delete, or read to identify the event UID.
input.options: Optional parameters; delete supports soft, list supports filters, push supports type (incremental|full).

output.event: Returned when create, update, or read succeeds, containing event details.
output.status: Returned when push or status succeeds, containing synchronization status information.
output.error: If an operation fails, returns an error message string.
